mapper.select: SELECT T1.id, T1.post_title, T1.post_content, T1.post_newsfeeds, T1.post_time, T1.post_level, T1.like_count likes, T1.comment_count comments, T2.sn ui_sn, T2.nickname ui_nickname, T2.mobile ui_mobile, T2.email ui_email, T2.gender ui_gender, T2.member_avatar ui_member_avatar, d.id fi_id, d.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, d.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro, d.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url, (SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like WHERE post_id = T1.id AND member_sn=#{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) liked, case when ch.id is not null then "1" else "0" end voted, ch.selected_option, T1.effective_time, T1.post_type, T1.vote_count FROM feeds_member_post_fandom T1 LEFT JOIN feeds_member_fandom c ON T1.fandom_id = c.fandom_id LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile T2 ON T1.member_sn = T2.sn LEFT JOIN feeds_fandom d ON c.fandom_id=d.id LEFT JOIN feeds_member_post_choice ch ON (T1.id = ch.post_id AND ch.voter_sn = #{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHERE c.member_sn = #{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by T1.id desc

SELECT f.id, f.post_title, f.post_content, f.post_newsfeeds, f.post_time, p.sn ui_sn, p.nickname ui_nickname, p.member_avatar ui_member_avatar, g.id fi_id, g.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, g.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro, g.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url FROM feeds_member_post_fandom f LEFT JOIN feeds_fandom g ON g.id=f.fandom_id LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile p ON f.member_sn = p.sn WHERE f.post_title LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%') or f.post_content LIKE concat('%',#{searchVal},'%')

SELECT p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_newsfeeds, p.post_time, p.like_count likes, ( SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like l WHERE l.member_sn = #{currentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and l.post_id=p.id ) liked, p.comment_count comments, f.id fi_id, f.fandom_name fi_fandom_name, f.fandom_parent_id fi_fandom_parent_id, f.fandom_creator_sn fi_fandom_creator_sn, f.fandom_avatar_url fi_fandom_avatar_url, f.fandom_intro fi_fandom_intro, case when ch.id is not null then "1" else "0" end voted, ch.selected_option, p.effective_time, p.post_type, p.vote_count, mp.sn ui_sn, mp.nickname ui_nickname, mp.member_avatar ui_member_avatar FROM feeds_member_post_fandom p LEFT JOIN feeds_fandom f ON f.id = p.fandom_id LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile mp ON mp.sn = p.member_sn LEFT JOIN feeds_member_post_choice ch ON (p.id = ch.post_id AND ch.voter_sn = #{currentSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHERE p.id = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.id, T1.post_title, T1.post_content, T1.post_newsfeeds, T1.post_time, T1.like_count likes, T1.comment_count comments,
(SELECT count(1) FROM feeds_member_post_like WHERE post_id = T1.id AND member_sn=#{mySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) liked,
case when ch.id is not null then "1" else "0" end voted, ch.selected_option,
CASE WHEN T1.effective_time is null then "0" WHEN T1.effective_time >= sysdate() then "0" ELSE "1" END expired, T1.effective_time, T1.post_type, T1.vote_count, T2.sn ui_sn, T2.nickname ui_nickname, T2.member_avatar ui_member_avatar FROM feeds_member_post_fandom T1 LEFT JOIN connects_member_profile T2 ON T1.member_sn = T2.sn
LEFT JOIN feeds_member_post_choice ch ON (T1.id = ch.post_id AND ch.voter_sn = #{mySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
WHERE T1.fandom_id = #{fandomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND T1.member_sn=#{memberSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T1.post_type="V") a ORDER BY a.expired ASC, a.id DESC
